source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_SEQ_00<tab>Dancing Wolf awaits your return, a grave expression upon his features.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_SEQ_00<tab>不滅隊：作戦本部のダンシング・ウルフ大闘士は、沈痛な面持ちで冒険者を待っている。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_SEQ_01<tab>Dancing Wolf welcomes your return to the Hall of Flames with news of another attack. According to the report, it seems that the villain you assume to be Tristan has struck again at a mining operation in central Thanalan. Head to the Nanawa Mines, and question the miner who survived the slaughter.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_SEQ_01<tab>ダンシング・ウルフ大闘士によると、トリスタンの犯行らしき襲撃事件がまた起きてしまったそうだ。被害者から話を聞きに行かなければ。中央ザナラーンのナナワ銀山の「襲われた鉱員」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_SEQ_02<tab>Tired of the constant interruptions to his work, the assaulted miner stubbornly refuses to answer any more queries until you provide the assistance he has requested. The surly laborer puts Dancing Wolf to work hauling rocks, and assigns you the task of retrieving chunks of fire silver stolen by the local spriggans. Investigate the spriggan scratchings, and wrest the rare ore from the clutches of the thieving soulkin.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_SEQ_02<tab>情報を聞くために、襲われた鉱員の仕事を手伝うことになった。ナナワ銀山で「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9BD101 /var>」を調べて、魔物から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B4201 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_SEQ_03<tab>You have defeated the spriggans, and recovered several chunks of fire silver. Deliver the ore to the assaulted miner at the Nanawa Mines.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_SEQ_03<tab>スプリガンから<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B4201 /var>を取り返した。ナナワ銀山の「襲われた鉱員」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B4201 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_SEQ_04<tab>Pleased by the return of his fire silver, the miner at last agrees to share the tale of the attack. Y'mhitra arrives just as the laborer begins his story, and once more signals you to summon Ifrit-Egi as a means of confirming the attacker's identity. In response to the question of what motivated the villain's actions, the miner insists that Tristan was after only one thing: crystals. Return to the Hall of Flames, and discuss this worrying revelation.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_SEQ_04<tab>襲われた鉱員から襲撃事件の話を聞いた。どうやら、トリスタンらしき犯人はクリスタルを狙っているようだ。不滅隊：作戦本部の「ダンシング・ウルフ大闘士」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_SEQ_05After reexamining various incident reports, Dancing Wolf is convinced that Tristan was behind several other recent attacks that were mistakenly attributed to the Amalj'aa. With every case involving the theft of crystals, Y'mhitra voices the concern of all present: the nefarious madman harbors plans to call forth a primal. If the atrocities of the past are to be averted in the present, then you must take full advantage of Y'mhitra's studies, and master the recovered wisdom of Allag's summoners.

※The next summoner quest will be available from Dancing Wolf upon reaching level 56.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_SEQ_05ダンシング・ウルフが他の襲撃事件を調べ直した所、すべての事件でクリスタルが奪われていた。犯人の目的は、蛮神の召喚だったのだ。召喚士狩りという歴史を繰り返させないために、トリスタンに負けない力を蓄えておこう。

※召喚士のレベルが56以上になると、不滅隊：作戦本部のダンシング・ウルフ大闘士から次の召喚士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the assaulted miner at the Nanawa Mines.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_TODO_00<tab>ナナワ銀山の襲われた鉱員と話す

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_TODO_01<tab>Investigate spriggan scratchings and obtain chunks of fire silver.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9BD101 /var>を調べて魔物から<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B4201 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the chunks of fire silver to the assaulted miner.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_TODO_02<tab>襲われた鉱員に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B4201 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Dancing Wolf at the Hall of Flames.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_TODO_03<tab>不滅隊：作戦本部のダンシング・ウルフ大闘士と話す

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_000<tab>Auspicious timing, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. There has been news...and none of it good. Our soldiers in central Thanalan have reported another attack.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_000来てくれたか……！
不滅隊に情報が入ってきた……ただ、こちらの望まぬ形でな。
そう、ふたたび襲撃事件が起きてしまったのだ……！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_001<tab>I looked over the notes for the initial investigation, and it would seem Tristan─or someone who looks very much like him─has struck again. I'll have one of my men contact Y'mhitra with the details, but I suggest we head out to the Nanawa Mines immediately and question one of the surviving victims.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_001調査報告に目を通したが、トリスタンの犯行の可能性が高い。
ヤ・ミトラの嬢ちゃんには、俺から連絡しておく。
現場の「ナナワ銀山」で、鉱員から話を聞こう……！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_005<tab>Y'mhitra sent word that she would be along shortly. If only this gentleman was as agreeable...
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_005嬢ちゃんも、すぐに来るそうだ。
しかし、この鉱員……。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_006<tab>I am on the cusp of unlocking another secret from the tomestones... Pray continue the investigation without me for now.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_006少しだけ調べたいことがあるの。
悪いけど、先に向っておいて……。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_010<tab>Whaddaya mean, more questions? I've spilled me tale to three different soldiers already! Me work gets further an' further behind every time I gotta stop an' talk to you folk!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_010また、調査ってかあ？
もう事情聴取は勘弁してくれよ……。
その度に仕事中断させられて、納期過ぎちまってんだぜ？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_011<tab>...Here's an idea, though: how about you scratch my back, an' I'll scratch yours? That big lad in the uniform there looks like he could lift some good-sized rocks!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_011そうだな、話が聞きたいってんなら、
協力的姿勢を見せてもらわねえとなあ……。
例えば、そっちのオッサンには、鉱石を運搬してもらうとか！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_012<tab>An' what about you, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>─you some sorta mage? We've had some trouble with the local spriggans swipin' our fire silver, an' you're just the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((bloke)) /var> to get it back. That stuff's as rare as chocobo teeth, you know!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_012は、魔法使いか？
さっきスプリガンどもに、稀少な「」を奪われちまってよ。
そいつを取り返してきてくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_013<tab>Now just a moment, sir! We don't have the time for these distractions!
target: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_013<tab>ちょっと待て、俺たちに仕事を手伝えというのか！？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_014<tab>Then maybe <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> don't got the time to talk to you. Not until there's a little “give” with your “take.”
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_014だーかーらー、協力的姿勢を見せてほしいのさあ。
俺は仕事を手伝ってもらえて、時間のロスを軽減できる。
あんたらは情報を得ることができる……文句ないだろう？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_015<tab>I fear he means to be stubborn about this, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Please humor the man, and retrieve his precious ore from the spriggans...
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_015……仕方ない、すまんが、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
この付近を探して、その「」とやらを、
スプリガンどもから取り返してきてくれ……！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_020<tab>Aye, I'm gonna need me fire silver back from them spriggans. Always lurkin' nearby, they are, sniffin' about the carts... You'll find 'em soon enough.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_020スプリガンどもに「」を奪われちまったんだ。
まだ、その辺をうろついてるはずだからよ。
そいつを取り返してきてくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_025<tab><pant> <pant> ...This is a picnic...compared to my officer training...
target: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_025<tab>ぬう……なあに、不滅隊の教練に比べれば、これしき……！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_030<tab>You find them spriggans, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>? What about me fire silver?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_030よう、！
「」は取り返せたかいー？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_035<tab>Oho, you got the whole lot back! Much appreciated!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_035おっ、数もバッチリだな！
いやあ、助かったぜー！

source:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_040My apologies─my studies took rather longer than I─
...Captain Wolf? Is everything all right?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_040遅くなって、ごめんなさい……！
……ダンシング・ウルフ大闘士、なんだか疲れていない？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_041<tab>...Everything's fine. Now, let's hear your story, sir.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_041……何でもない。
それより、話を聞かせてくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_042<tab>Aye, I reckon you've earned it. Well, we was in the mine, loadin' the carts with our haul for the day, when this bloke in robes appears. Doesn't say a word─the bastard just snaps his fingers, an' sets his pet demon to lightin' me mates on fire...
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_042ああ、銀山で作業をしてたら、ローブの男が現れたんだ。
いきなり、炎をぶっ放す魔物をけしかけて来やがってよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_043<tab>Ifrit-Egi... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, if you would be so kind?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_043炎の魔物……
)) (( )) 02 /var>、イフリート・エギを……！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_044<tab>Bloody hells! Aye, that's the fiend I saw!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_044うわっ、スゲー！
ローブの男が命令してた炎の魔物と同じだ！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_045<tab>'Tis as we feared, then... And this robe-clad man─do you have any idea of why he attacked you?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_045やはりね……。
ところで、ローブの男が襲ってきたときは、
どんな仕事をしていたの？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_046<tab>Well, lass, there's more than silver to be had from Nanawa─on a good day, we dig up our fair share of crystals, as well. That seems to be what he was after.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_046ああ、ナナワ銀山では、鉱石だけじゃなくて、
クリスタルも産出するんだけどよ……。
ちょうど、採掘したクリスタルの搬出中だったな。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_047<tab>I'm not ashamed to say that I fled for me life once folk started goin' up in flames. But when I went back to sort out the mess, the cart what had the crystals in it was empty.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_047炎の魔物に襲われて、慌てて逃げ出してさ。
その後、戻ってみたら、列車に積んでたクリスタルが、
ごっそりなくなってたんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_048<tab>...He took them all?
target: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_048<tab>クリスタルがなくなっていた……？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_049<tab>Aye, every single one. An' that's all I've got to say about that. Hope you catch the bastard!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_MINER02102_000_049ああ、俺が見たのは、それで全部さ。
そんじゃ、手伝ってくれてありがとうなー！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_050<tab>Crystals... There was a crate of crystals on the list of goods stolen from that caravan. He must have taken everything else to conceal his intent...
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_050待てよ……確か、ドライボーンで聞き込みをしたときも、
クリスタルが奪われていた、という話を聞いたような……。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_051<tab>Our quarry grows careless...or simply impatient. It is time I reexamined certain other incidents that we did not think related to this case. Meet me at the Hall of Flames and we shall discuss the matter further.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_051少し見えてきたかもしれん……！
俺は作戦本部に戻って、ほかの事件も洗い出してみる。
お前たちも、後から来てくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_052<tab>I can imagine only one reason why a man such as Tristan would seek to acquire a wealth of crystals... Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─let us not keep Captain Wolf waiting.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_052トリスタンの目的がクリスタルだとしたら……！
私たちも「ウルダハ」へ向かいましょう！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_055<tab>Whatever evil our callous foe is planning, we cannot allow it to come to fruition. Let us speak with Captain Wolf, and learn what else his investigations have uncovered.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_055クリスタルが敵の狙いだとしたら、推測できる部分もあるわ。
ダンシング・ウルフ大闘士から、話を聞いてみましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_060<tab>...I inspected our incident records, paying close attention to cargo manifests that included crystals. We had attributed several recent raids to the Amalj'aa, but the victims were, every one of them, burned to death. Not entirely impossible, considering the lizardmen's affinity for fire, but to find not a single arrow or spear wound...?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_060……思ったとおりだったぞ。
襲撃事件に関する資料を見なおしてみたが、
すべての事件でクリスタルが持ち去られていた。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_061<tab>Aye, 'tis highly unlikely. Mayhap I should state aloud what we are all thinking...
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_061疑似蛮神「召喚獣」を使役する召喚士は、
蛮神との関わりがとても深い……。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_062<tab>Judging by the sheer number of crystals involved, we must assume that this villain intends to call forth a primal.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_062そんな人物がクリスタルを狙う理由といえば……
やはり、蛮神召喚を目論んでいると考えるべきね。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_063<tab>After my encounter with Ifrit, I learned just how devastatingly powerful these entities can be... And I believe that summoners, with their ability to harness such power, hold the potential to achieve great things.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_063俺はイフリートと戦って、その力をこの身で味わった……。
あの圧倒的な力を、味方として利用できる召喚魔法は、
大きな可能性を秘めていると思ってる。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_064<tab>But if Tristan truly is mad enough to summon a primal, then that unthinkable act─and the bloody deeds he performed in preparation for it─will cause people to question the motives of all who practice the summoner's art!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_064だが、トリスタンが蛮神召喚なんて暴挙を犯せば……
召喚魔法まで有害なものとみなされ、
戦術として利用することが難しくなっちまう！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_065<tab>My studies of the tomestones revealed to me a tale of adulation: the summoners of Allag were revered as heroes for their part in defeating the ancient primals.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_065アラグの遺物、アラガントームストーンを調べてわかったの。
かつて、敵対する蛮神を退けたアラグの召喚士は、
一度は英雄と称えられていたわ……。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_066<tab>But reverence slowly turned to revulsion as practitioners─intoxicated by their own immense power─began wielding the art of summoning as a means to further their own selfish ambitions.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_066しかし、やがて、その強大な力に溺れて、
私利私欲のために、召喚魔法を使う者が現れはじめた……。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_067<tab>That is not to say, of course, that all summoners chose to become tyrants. Amongst the common people, however, it became a strongly held superstition that those who meddled in the powers of primals ultimately fell into the embrace of evil.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_067もちろん、召喚士がみな愚者だったわけではないでしょう。
でも、人々の中には「蛮神の力を使うから悪に堕ちる」という、
思想が広がってしまった……。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_068<tab>This superstition blossomed into outright terror, and that is when the mage hunts began... By the end of the Third Astral Era, the last of the summoners had vanished from the stage of history.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_068そして、人々の恐れが頂点に達したとき、
召喚士狩りが行われ、彼らは歴史の表舞台から消えた……。
これが、第三星暦の末期に起こった史実よ……。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_069<tab>And should we allow Tristan to go through with his plans, then we risk a repeat of that tragedy. I will review the state of patrols on the crystal trade routes─we <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> catch him!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_DANCINGWOLF_000_069トリスタンが蛮神召喚を行えば、歴史が繰り返されてしまう。
俺は、クリスタルの流通経路の警護を見なおしてみる。
必ずや、ヤツを止めなければ……！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_070<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Before I joined you at the Nanawa Mines, I was able to recover another incantation that may prove useful in the coming days. Wield its power wisely...
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN540_02102_YMHITRA_000_070)) (( )) 02 /var>。
遺物から得られた新たな技の知識を、あなたに授けるわ。
トリスタンを捕えるためにも、力を蓄えておいて……！
